definitions.meaning:
withstand sth
( formal) to be strong enough not to be hurt or damaged by extreme conditions, the use of force, etc.
 承受；抵住；顶住；经受住

examples.content:
The materials used have to be able to withstand high temperatures. 
所使用的材料必须能够耐高温。

They had withstood siege, hunger and deprivation. 
他们经受了围困、饥饿和贫穷。
